title: Can‚Äôt WAIT to stay here Again!!!
text: They have a nice modern look about their property. We arrived extremely late in the evening and it was especially nice to see that their room service menu ran until 4:00 am!!! But the absolute best most AMAZING part was their BED!!!!! OMG!!!! It was the absolute most wonderful bed in the whole wide WORLD!!!! I don‚Äôt even remember shutting my eyes. It was like as soon as I laid down I was out cold. I can not compare it to anything I‚Äôve ever experienced in a hotel before, and we stay in ALOT of hotels!!! From the Hilton to the Courtyard to LaQuinta and so on.... but this was by far the most dreamy bed ever! No, not pardoning the pun either! You will definitely not be disappointed!

title: Horribly rude staff
text: I missed two calls from a number that turned out to be from the Red Roof Inn, Arlington, TX Entertainment District. I returned the call not knowing who it was from. I could not understand the lady that answered the phone and asked her two times to repeat who she was and with what company. After a third request, she yelled into the phone, ‚ÄúRed Roof Inn. We are a hotel, not a company‚Äù. I calmly told her there was no reason to yell and told her I was returning a call from that number to which she yelled, ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt call you!‚Äù I told her that someone did and that she was rude and I would likely be canceling my reservations to which she replied ‚Äúokay, fine‚Äù and hung up. The other party traveling with us had a similar experience when calling to cancel. We have both now cancelled and will not stay there in the future. This staff member is obviously in the wrong field.

title: Mostly good service
text:
Had a couple hiccups with them. Lost a room that was booked in Memphis, which was awful. We drove for 12 hours that day and arrived at night, assuming our room was secured as always. I didn‚Äôt call ahead this time. They didn‚Äôt have the reservation. I had to book a room with another hotel as quickly as possible. 
When reported to Booking, they said they‚Äôd reimburse part of my stay (or something close to that because I paid more), but they never did what was stated. No refund or credit has been presented. So, that was a huge dislike on them. However, I still use them. They‚Äôre pretty reliable for the most part.

title: Seaside 2
text: Everything was perfect! From Nespresso sleeves with different coffee cups to extra toothbrushes. The villa was supplied with all the necessary. It had one small flaw, the upstairs rooms had fans only I think it lacks a small AC unit upstairs as well because it gets very hot during the nights. Also, the inside stairway has no holding handles which can be potentially dangerous for little children. All in all, we really enjoyed our stay here, the people renting it were very kind they even gave us beach chairs and extra umbrella and were constantly asking us if we‚Äôre doing okay. We would definitely come again!

title: The room is clean
text: The rooms are nothing special, however the front desk clerk was extremely kind. She has a couple people waiting to check in and both phones were ringing, but she did not act rushed or overwhelmed, even though I knew she had to have been. She is something special and knows customer service. The hotel and room was clean. This is an older hotel, but the upgrades they did were very nice. The fitness room has a funky smell, but we only went through it to get to the pool, which was nice. Over all I have nothing bad to say about our stay, it served it‚Äôs purpose and was a safe clean place to sleep for the night. And the view was very nice

title: Superb
text:
My girlfriend and I arrived To Orlando on a Thursday night to check in to the Doubletree and as soon as we walked into the hotel we were greeted by the most absolute professional, and phenomenal front desk representatives. I stayed at many Hilton hotels Throughout the years, even Hilton Grand Vacations and this experience has been by far the best. Rachel‚Äôs energy and customer service skills were freaking mind blowing she helped us get squared away with checkin in literally 5mins tops. Carlos & Brianna were also sooooo polite and generous they told us about the breakfast buffet, and even gave us a bunch of cookies üç™ before sending us on our way.
IF YOU ARE STAYING IN THE ORLANDO AREA THE DOUBLE TREE NEAR UCF IS THE BEST HOTEL IN THE AREA AND P.S. THE INSIDE IS SUPER LUXURIOUS!!!

HIGHLY RECOMMEND! This place is amazing. My room was beautiful, clean and huge. I loved the peaceful and calm the atmosphere. By far my favorite thing about this place is the staff! Very polite, and extremely helpful. I lost a necklace that was extremely sentimental to me, I wrote them an email expressing my stress and worry about misplacing it. They responded immediately and told me they would do everything they could to find it. About 2 days later I received a picture message of my necklace saying they had located it and offered to send! Will definitely be staying here again and recommending to everyone I know.

title: Wonderful!
text: I stayed here at the end of February and it was a wonderful trip! I was up visiting some old college friends during a school vacation and the inn was super accommodating when I had to change my stay dates due to an impending storm. The room was clean and lovely and the bed was very comfortable, and it was in a great central location very near (but not in) downtown Bar Harbor. And I cannot rave enough about the breakfast - I had to leave a day early (due to another storm and a long drive home) and I was super bummed to miss out on my last day of breakfast. Would absolutely recommend for a solo traveler, couple, or family.

title: Awesome location with style and convenience
text: We will definitely stay here again. We loved the convenience of an apartment set up for tourists. It was sparkling clean, very clean and stylish. Just steps from upper town but situated in a neighborhood with wonderful cafes, restaurants, grocery stores, shops and bars. And the best gelato and sorbet ever at Tutto Gelato! Parking was easy. The staff was welcoming and helpful. Really a perfect spot for our family. The building is on a very busy street. We weren‚Äôt bothered by the bus noise but others might be. The apartment is bright and beautiful but it‚Äôs still bright in the morning even with shades drawn so bring an eye mask. I wish there were more of these establishments in the US!

title: Not always the best price
text: It‚Äôs worth checking other sites and even calling the place you are planning to stay.  They usually have the best price, but one time we paid 3 times the amount for the room. They also don‚Äôt list all of the hotels in the area. This last trip made it look like everything was sold out. Not even close!!  Also, the place we stayed at said they had breakfast but because Covid, (which has become an excuse to reduce service) they give you a 15% off coupon for the restaurant next door. I travelled a lot last year and this is the first place that didn‚Äôt offer breakfast when they said they did.

title: Branson nightly condos superior villa
text: No issues this app help me find , over night stay for me and the family, total of 13 people, we booked branson nightly condo ‚Ä¢ the pictures didnt do justice to this place. Really very nice place, four bedrooms each with one queen bed, there is a  queen size sofa bed , and a queen size bed that you let down from wall, very spacious. They did forget to leave  my air mattress .and they said they would text and let me know when my room was ready and they forgot. But I still rate 5 star. I called couple times prior to arrival dates and emailed and always received good customer service

title: Wonderful Stay with a Small Privacy Issue and AC
text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at this hotel, and overall, it was a fantastic experience. The breakfast was delightful, the hotel itself was charming, and the staff were incredibly welcoming and accommodating.

However, there were a couple of aspects that warrant consideration. Firstly, our room, the Bride Room, lacked windows, contributing to an airless atmosphere. While the room had a cozy charm, the absence of ventilation was noticeable.

Additionally, there was a minor hiccup with the curtains not providing enough privacy, especially given the room's location near the entrance. Despite these considerations, the hotel's positive attributes, such as excellent service and reasonable pricing, overshadowed these concerns.

In conclusion, I would highly recommend this hotel for its warmth and hospitality, but potential guests should be aware of the ventilation and privacy aspects, especially if these are crucial to your stay. I hope the management addresses these minor issues to ensure an even more enjoyable experience for future guests.

title: Don‚Äôt use if there is a chance you might cancel.
text: I have used booking several times and never had an issue until I had to cancel I room. I was told to contact the hotel because they would need to waive the fees. The hotel said they always allow cancellations up to 24 hours in advance without charge. Shouldn‚Äôt be a problem since I was trying to cancel 5 days in advance. Nope. Booking kept telling me to contact the hotel. Hotel kept saying they would cancel the fees but that booking needs to contact them because it‚Äôs bookings reservation. Long story short I paid $300 for a room I couldn‚Äôt use. I hope you enjoy that $300 because you will never see another penny from me. DO NOT USE if there‚Äôs a chance you might cancel. I will be setting up reservations directly with the hotels from now on. A complete joke.

title: Browse, compare prices, save link for later
text:
I‚Äôm new to the App because my wife does all the planning for family trips. I wanted to go out on the limb and try to book a hotel myself as a birthday surprise. 

I‚Äôve always been hesitant/reluctant to give my personal details (e.g name, telephone number, email, and credit card number) online; fortunately, this App is professionally done and inspires confidence. My colleague recommended the App which makes me feel more comfortable. 

Finally, since I‚Äôm a new user, I‚Äôm pleased with how user-friendly it is to search for hotels, set filters, see photos, get ratings, and make a reservation. It‚Äôs easy. It‚Äôs intuitive.

title: This Is The One
text: You will get the best deal online for your search through this one. I‚Äôm saving you trying the other ones, I have. We‚Äôre spoiled for choice and sometimes it‚Äôs hard to sort signal from noise. I‚Äôve tried all the other methods and means of online travel bookings and searches, and this one consistently brings me the best possible deal available, relative to the other travel aggregator sites and apps. Sadly they didn‚Äôt pay me to say this, I just wish someone had told it to me straight and truthfully like I just did for you prior to my having to try eleventy-seven aggregators to come to the realization I‚Äôm sharing in this review. This is the one.

title: Homewood Suites is home away from home
text: The room was as big as an apartment with stainless steel full-size fridge and dishwasher, two- burner modern stovetop all the dishes needed to entertain and a large flatscreen rotating tv. There is also ample closet and dresser space, desk and a sofa bed. I had a ceiling fan over my king sized comfy bed and the bathroom was very roomy. Very classy accommodations. The staff was wonderful. Breakfast was in a large dining area that had a conversation space including a sofa, cocktail table and two sofa chairs. Food was served in silver chafing trays and was homemade. Had cheese eggs, biscuits, fresh fruit, muffins, waffles, fruit juices, sausage and bacon. Didn‚Äôt get to enjoy the pool or workout room this trip, but will next time! Just lovely.

title: A joke
text: I‚Äôve used booking a few years now but last night was some straight bull. I desperately needed a room and once arriving to the location they couldn‚Äôt find me in the system. So the money was taken out my account and I have to wait for the refund but I wasn‚Äôt able to get a room and spent two hours or maybe more on the phone with them acting like they were gonna get me a room at another hotel and they would pay for it and at the end of it all I had no room no money back yet and a long ride home. Definitely never using booking again!!!!!!

title: Worst possible place
text: Front desk closes at 7 pm. No one on sundays.   The guy at front desk said I didn‚Äôt have a reservation even after showing him my confirmation.   I never got pillows, trash cans or phone in my room. Day 2 I took a bath and had a pounding on my door to ‚Äúopen up‚Äù. I had 5 fireman standing there saying water was pouring into the bathroom below me.   They saw my bathtub was not draining and holding water, then the manager came up and accused me of causing trouble on the property and was going to escort me off the property.   I was livid as it was all lies.   But it was discovered a pipe burst in the wall and had nothing to do with me.  No apology, no integrity.    The only person who was fair and nice was Percy. He assisted me in moving rooms twice in two days.  The manager took my money and wouldn‚Äôt refund any even tho he wanted to kick me out and lied.   I stayed in third room with no heat, pillows , or garbage cans.  NEVER AGAIN.

title: Okay but...
text: I‚Äôve been using this app for a couple of years and for the most part it‚Äôs a good app but this past weekend I used it to book a king size room to check in at 5am at a hotel on the app only to show up and be told we couldn‚Äôt check in until 3pm or had to pay more money and had to get a double bed room for me and my husband because the hotel only had 1 king room that had been used and not cleaned. There needs to be a better vetting system for these roach motels. I don‚Äôt think they should be listed if they don‚Äôt have a certain amount of stars because reviews and pictures can be deceiving and if are traveling to an area you aren‚Äôt familiar with; all you have is this app to tell you about the hotel and area. Not happy at all!

title: Excellent app
text:
Really like how it lets you adjust all of your profile info.  

One warning however: There‚Äôs a bug! When I put my middle initial at the end of my first name (like ‚ÄúJohn Q‚Äù) when setting up this App, and then my last name in the last name field (like ‚ÄúPublic‚Äù), (because my credit card shows my name as ‚ÄúJohn Q Public‚Äù), the reservation that got sent to the property from B.C. was listed under ‚ÄúQ Public‚Äù and they couldn‚Äôt find my reservation under ‚ÄúPublic‚Äù as a result! (It wasn‚Äôt listed under ‚ÄúPublic‚Äù as it should have been).

So, BEWARE!  Do not include your middle initial because the app will stick it in front of your last name and you‚Äôll never find your reservation when you call the property for any reason.

title: Woodspring suits
text:
I would like to start off by saying this was in if the BEST experience that I have experienced at a hotel. The customer service was beyond great. I have no complaints beside you have to bring your own dish and silverware. Although the hotel do offer at a low price for a new set.  There is no pool but they do have a workout room and a nice laundry room to wash clothing. 
There is a lot of ppl staying/living at the hotel which mean everyone is kept themselves but don't mind a conversation. Overall it was a nice experience. It is also very kid friendly, no loud music, kids or pets in the hotel. Will be back

title: Worst experience ever!
text:
I booked travel which I had to cancel. Received a letter confirming my reservation was canceled. When I checked my credit card, I was charged on my credit card.
I have spend hours getting my money back. 2 weeks now. Customer service is incompetent and obnoxious and will now have to fight it over my credit card. Never expected this. Customer service email, no longer monitored. 
Do yourself a favor do not book with booking. com. Book with hotel directly or go to other booking companies. Booking. Com not in US but Holland so they don‚Äôt give you your money back even so they send you a letter we will refund 100%.

title: Limon-LaQuinta
text: I was very surprised by this gem of an oasis just a ways from Denver. To be honest I wasn‚Äôt expecting much due to location and low price for a pass through one night stay. I was greeted by Wanda with exceptionally good rapport. The room was extremely clean, the amenities very up to date and new modern appearance.  Breakfast was modified to some degree due to Covid but still had hot pancakes and oatmeal and hot coffee ready. All of the staff we met were really friendly and the manager went out of his way to make sure we had an enjoyable stay‚Ä¶ I will stay there again soon if I have a need to travel to Denver or further.

userName: in love with mine craft man
title: Deadwood Fun
text: This place has an old time feel and is in the heart of DT Deadwood. The hotel lobby has a casino and a 1970s look & smell of cigarettes smoke, but that gives it character. The rooms have the feel of an old west town. And are all upstairs. There‚Äôs an elevator as well as multiple stair cases. Our  room had comfortable beds and was clean, but dod not have many outlets & no USB chargers. However, it did have beautiful curtains over big windows with a wonderful view of the main drag so you could see all of the action down on the street below. The bathroom was big and the large bathtub had hot tub jets. The hotel also gave us a King bed with a pullout wall bed for our child. He likes that!

title: Beautiful place
text:
We enjoyed just about everything about our apartment. We were met by Lucia when we arrived and when we were ready to leave. The location was perfect for us. The beds were all comfortable. We didn‚Äôt cook at all but the kitchen was great for our needs (lots of wine glasses üòÉ). 
The bathroom steps are still scary but we put a light tape on them to see them better. They are each a dark grey now and blend together. Lots of light because of the windows so very pleasant to sit in the main room. All the bedroom windows have blinds so you can be in darkness if you like. 
Overall, a perfect fit for our group of 4 females traveling together.

title: A hidden gem perfect for escapes from the crowds!
text:
From the moment we met the boat driver at the pier, to the check in experience, stay and check out this was a trip to remember for all the right reasons. 

Great friendly staff who organized in advance a private boat transfer 600 THB per boat per way from Ao Nang (you will need to pay more for other piers), fast service, room ready early morning and a great menu and drinks set up. The staff here described this place as a 3 star resort, but the service was compatible with many 5 stars I have stayed at. Thank you for a memorable birthday and a great stay - we will be back!

title: Wonderful stay!
text: We had the best time at Unique Milos Suites. Stelios was so kind and greeted us. He showed us how everything worked and gave us great tips on what to see and where to eat on the island. The suite was lovely, very clean and comfortable . Every detail was addressed from the extra dental essentials to the candle lighting on the beach at night. There was always a large platter of fresh fruit and delicious baked goodies available. Also loved the little courtyard in the back. Stelios and his wife were always available if we needed anything. They were both very courteous and gracious hosts. Would highly recommend Unique Milos Suites.

title: Excellent Stay! Friendly staff & clean!
text:
Very comfortable stay! They provided a very high powered fan that kept the room cool even during the hot summer. The Staff was incredibly helpful & friendly. There was a bottle of wine offered complimentary to each room. The gym on site is very nice and costs less than 5‚Ç¨ to use. The terrace on the 6th floor is beautiful! There is giant chess too and regular chess in the lobby. I would highly recommend this hotel & would stay here again myself! The location is perfect too right in the city but never any street noise because it is not off a Main Street so it was perfect! 

Thank you :):)

title: Room
text:
Hi checked in at the hotel! All the staff is friendly and have made new friends! The house keep his name is Mashud and he is also training a new person Russell! Well these two housekeepers are excellent! Very polite and efficient! I have come to know them well and insisted they call me by my first name! They have done so! They have made me feel so welcomed here! Then the security team!! Well done I have become great friends with a few! You all have made me feel so welcome, thank you to the following people: John-security, Khamisi, Boo Boo-security, Jamshad-consigned! Mashud and Russell- Housekeepers! All of you A+ Service! Thank you 

Nick Shackell

title: booking is a fraud
text: I spent $128 for a reservation but they only gave me $2 as a refund. I cancelled it before the 6pm deadline they had for my reservation. I tried to contact them and: a. They make it very difficult to contact customer service. They give out the option to call but the confirmation # they give you is too long for the automated message, so you can‚Äôt even use that as an option. b. The messaging system is absurd. They don‚Äôt seem to have the option of messaging on the website and through their app you have to go through a header to start a message and not through the options given for a reservation. When I finally did get into contact with them, they still have not responded. If I could give them 0 stars, I would have. Save yourself the headache and use another booking app.

title: A great place for vacation
text: This was our second time visiting and we had 2 or more units!! The clubhouse is really nice, the outdoor and indoor was very clean!! The staff was helpful and many things for kids to do. I loved that our townhouse had bikes, sitting right on the lake was so nice!! The beds were comfortable, when you called with any issues someone came right out with in an hour as promised. I think the trash should be picked up every day, the cans are located under the steps going to front door so FLIES WAS A PAIN!!!  That space needs to be redesignedü§∑üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è The living room furniture is REALLY in need of updating!!!  Great location to get to beaches in 30 minutes!!! We will go again!!!

title: Boulders Resort
text: This property is luxurious! The rooms are beautifully decorated and spacious. Staff was extremely friendly and helpful, plus, golf cart drivers were great for getting to and from the room. Food on property was yummy and complementary water was amazing, especially in the warmer months like August. The resort is located about 30 minutes outside of Scottsdale and 40-45 minutes from PHX airport. The drive is 100% worth it for the beautiful scenery and gorgeous views. The main pool had food and drinks which was super convenient for a long pool day. Overall, this resort had a chill and relaxing vibe! Would recommend and stay again!

title: Romyen Cafe‚Äô Homestay 10/10
text: This is easily the best hotel we have stayed at in Ayutthaya. Tucked away off the road across from Rajamangala University, this brand new hotel offers a beautiful river side view with plenty of room to sit while you enjoy your morning breakfast. Conveniently located about ten minute walk away from the historic Ayutthaya city center, this hotel is extremely reasonably priced and run and owned by a wonderful family. The cafe below the hotel offers a free cafe style drink and delicious cafe style breakfast in the morning. If you are in Ayutthaya I‚Äôd highly recommend staying here for at least part of your next visit.

title: Cappadocia Fairy Tale Suites
text:
Best Hotel I have stayed so far in Turkey. Fantastic staff here special thanks to Yasir and Ahmed who are always ready to help you with anything or any request you have. You will see Ahmed always on the floor always with a smile. I have stayed here for 5 nights and Mr. Yasir assisted with all my tours arrangements, Hotel Air ballon, Horse Ridding tour, Red Tour, Green Tour and ATV tour and also assisted with airport pick as well as drop off up on my check out. It was an amazing stay at Cappadocia Fairy Tale Suites. I would definitely come back. 

I would definitely recommend anyone come to Cappadocia to try this hotel, it‚Äôs a 10/10 hotel in here.

title: Keep this app!!
text: I was hesitant about the app at first, but used it anyways. I was driving across country by myself. So, it was important that there were no hassels/problems. After driving for 16 hours, I would not have had the patience if the bookings fell through or the hotel didn‚Äôt have them when I arrived.  Everything went smoothly.  I like the app layout was easy and organized. Very user-friendly.   confirmed bookings were right in the middle which saved me many times looking for the address and the confirmation # when I arrived at the hotel. This app is Definitely a keeper!  You won‚Äôt be disappointed.

title: Amazing place and host
text:
Salvatierra Guesthouse in Ronda is a hidden gem that embodies the perfect retreat. Nestled in the heart of the city, its ideal location provides easy access to Ronda's attractions while offering breathtaking views of the Spanish landscape, especially during the captivating sunset.

The hosts at Salvatierra Guesthouse redefine hospitality with their genuine kindness. From the warm welcome that makes guests feel like cherished friends to going above and beyond to assist in every possible way, the hosts create a homey atmosphere that adds an extra layer of warmth to the stay.

Moreover, Salvatierra Guesthouse elevates the experience with an amazing breakfast. Thoughtfully prepared and featuring local flavors alongside international options, the breakfast becomes a delightful part of the morning ritual, complementing the stunning surroundings.

In essence, Salvatierra Guesthouse is not just accommodation; it's an immersive experience. The perfect location, beautiful views, hosts' kindness, and an amazing breakfast collectively make it a standout destination in the charming town of Ronda.

title: It‚Äôs not the old booking we knew
text:
Booking is working in favor of the hotel and us anymore. There are a lot of hidden prices that will end up on your bill. ie room occupancy, for example I booked a 2 bedroom that was advertised for 4 adults and two kids but it ended up as two queen size beds and no sofa bed. Each extra bed is another 150 per night. Booking response is that the room Sqm fits that advertised occupancy and you need to pay for xtra for extra bed which is in total enough to book an additional studio.
In addition that all the taxes and fees that they don‚Äôt show in total price. After making the booking a get a notification that there will be 15 per person per night charge pod to the hotel directly. 
You know what. I can live without your app and can make my booking directly or with other apps that show integrity and transparency

title: Vacation
text: The staff was so nice and so friendly to us when we first check in our hotel everything was fine until it was flying flys in our room 7103 which the building 7 and one of the fly bit me on my back so we  pack our things up and we when back to front and Mrs. Ashely was so nice and very polite and she moved us another one room building 4 and the 4303 we love it too so we will be back the food. Everything is so nice and so beautiful  We have a lot of activities to do a lot of fun for the kids as well. Last thing blue Green  Bayside please give her a Raise she is so excellentüíïü•∞ü•∞ü§©

title: Amazing hotel
text:
This NYC trip was a first for our young family. we have a toddler and a 10 year old. We arrived 30minutes after check in time. We were immediately accomodated by alexa and she took care of our rooms right away. Coming from a grueling flight- the kids are cranky and tired but we were able to get our room right away so we can rest and get ready for our first night in NYC. The room was already cool and the beds are comfy. The place was clean and tidy. Alexa made sure that all our needs are met as a family and we were very appreciative of the fact that- having a comfy and welcoming place to stay is crucial to having a great experience in a strange city.

Alexa made sure that our family gets to have that great experience. Alexa made a big difference in our NYC vacation. stewart hotel is very lucky to have her being on the frontline and represent the hotel.

I will keep coming back to this hotel. 
It was a great experience for me and my family.

title: Horrible! Horrible! Horrible
text:
0 stars!!!! Booked the 2 bedroom condo and 2 days before they cancelled it no reason given. They offered an alternative: 2 studios next to each other which we took. On check in, they told us that 1 of the units wasn‚Äôt available because the person there decided to extend their stay! We were given another unit in another floor so we weren‚Äôt even near each other. 

Roach infested in both units! One had 5 on kitchen stove alone upon arrival. My dad found three in the other unit when he entered. Both units were very dated, cheap furniture. Overhead light in one unit was broken and room was dim. The family did not feel comfortable with all these critters crawling all over so had to find a hotel. Emailed the owner about this and asked for a refund. No response so far. The whole experience was a nightmare!

title: Calma Suite Milos
text:
We had the best time at the Calma Suite Milos! This property is centrally located on Milos within a 15 minute drive to any part of the island. With a complementary breakfast delivered to your room every morning you are ready to hit the island running. This a family run spot, they are the nicest and kindest and not to mention they have two wonderful dogs who love belly rubs. 

The photos of the room don‚Äôt do it justice. Bedside views of Adamas are insane. The king size bed, immaculate lighting, his/her sinks, huge shower, larger-in-real-life dip pool, all make this the perfect stop for your Milos trip. Can‚Äôt recommend enough, and can‚Äôt wait to get back!

title: Make refunds impossible
text: I was unable to stay at a hotel I booked because of my age (I‚Äôm 19 and didn‚Äôt know it was a 21 and up hotel, that‚Äôs on me for not checking not on them, although I would‚Äôve appreciated a warning of some sort) and I still haven‚Äôt gotten my refund after making several phone calls and messages with both Booking and the hotel. Booking said they would send an email to the hotel to confirm that it would be okay for me to receive my refund but after contacting the hotel, they haven‚Äôt received an email even after I asked Booking to resend said email to the address I used to contact the hotel. So I assume that they just never sent the email, making it impossible for me to get my refund. I‚Äôve just given up at this point and will never use this app again.

title: Not bad
text:
The motel was unremarkable, we had noisy neighbors who sat out on the front patio until 11pm and then again at 5 in the morning. We couldn‚Äôt figure out the TV so we used our IPad. There was no air conditioning so we had to leave the windows open, but covered by the curtains. Probably not a safe idea, but is was quite warm even at night. The restaurant had a great menu, I had the rack of lamb,
 and the meal was quite delicious. Breakfast was in the restaurant with a full 2 egg, sausage, hash browns and fruit meal, or you could choose French toast or pancakes. Very nice and filling.
We walked down to the beach, but it wasn‚Äôt really conducive for a walk on the shoreline, still it was quite beautiful. Great location, 3 miles, from Hearst Castle.

title: Terrible Customer Service When A Hotel Cancels due to Rate
text: I have used Booking for years and for the first time I found myself in NYC checking in and being told that the reservation was cancelled by booking.  After asking both the hotel and Booking customer service they both pointed the finger at each other and the hotel made us pay $120 more than we originally paid booking to allow us to check in.  We were essentially held hostage at check-in by the hotel and Booking (after dealing with two different support specialists for over 45 minutes while standing at the check-in counter) was completely unhelpful.   I have lost all confidence that when I book through booking that I will actually have a room when I show up to check in‚Ä¶ Beyond Disappointed!

title: Lacking customer service
text: We booked a hotel for a holiday weekend where there was limited availability everywhere. We checked into a hotel in between 5-530pm and by 1109 we saw 4 cockroaches. Alive. I reached out to customer service 1109pm and they reached back out once with an automated response. I reached out more and provided pictures which they never got back to me after saying they would within 24hours.. they didn‚Äôt put us anywhere else, they didn‚Äôt offer customer service - nothing. We can‚Äôt dispute with the card because we stayed the duration due to no availability elsewhere and no response from customer service. When leaving the review of the hotel on their app they said they‚Äôd look into it. Still nothing. We checked in June 30th checked out July 2nd. This needs to be addressed and resolved.

title: Don‚Äôt use the pay now feature.
text: Don‚Äôt use the pay now feature. Only use the pay at front desk feature. I used the pay now feature and Booking charged my card and gave me a confirmation number. The lady at the front desk said they didn‚Äôt have any rooms. Still have not heard from booking about being refunded. They just refuse to correspond with me. Time for me to find another site to use.  The app is great. Works exactly like you expect it to.  Makes using your phone to reserve a room very simple. Contacting them to resolve an issue is a very big hassle.

title: Best inexpensive hotel
text:
Rooms are clean, beds and pillows super comfortable. Stayed here twice. People at front desk are always helpful and friendly. 
Rooms are nice. Bathrooms are clean but in fair condition. Round bowl toilets are not my favorite. Both rooms we stayed in were of the same quality. If I had to say where improvements are needed, it would be the bathrooms. Nothing major, just paint over the wall repairs better, clean paint splatter off floors. Little things like that. Breakfast is great. Lots to choose from. Will definitely stay here every time we fly out of Detroit. Paid around $75 with taxes for a night. Super cheap for the kind of hotel you get. Great value.

title: Amazing stay!!!
text:
After a really long travel journey the concierge and the Operations manager met us at the front desk. They were friendly, accommodating and understanding. We received 5 star service and treatment throughout our stay. Our 2 bedroom suite overlooking the ocean was beautiful, and had all the details and touches any guest would need. Ordering room service was as simple as sending a text message. Breakfast in the morning was delivered at a time of our choosing and the staff was amazing. 
Highly recommend this location. I will definitely book at the Aqua next time I visit Greece!

title: 3 Days in Green Bungalows
text:
We are from Georgiaüá¨üá™It was great time for 3 of us to spend these days in the green bungalows, great staff, great service, great location, everything was so close to us, the man in reception welcomed us so warmly and communicated with us so kindly, we want thank specially him, he was such a kind person and helped us all the time we needed. I responsibly recommend this hotel to everyone who is going to visit Ayia Napa. We are so satisfied, I hope we'll be back there. Thank you so much and we love Green Bungalows and its staff. Wish you good luck. 
Mariami, Elene, Beka.
Your the most satisfied guests from Georgia. üá¨üá™üá®üáæ

title: Next to the Termini and good location
text:
I was traveling next day early to other location inside Italy. So my first option was stay for a night near to the termini.
I‚Äôm a person who I prefer stay in an hotel when is one or two nights. So when I arrive the instruction was clear, I was guessing it was an other but no. Is a B&B but tMichele was so helpful in everything.   So kind and everything was easy, 25 minutes walking to Coliseum and 30 to Trevi Fountain 
Bed was nice and very clean and A/C the room was great. Just I missing some Coffe :) in the morning  but I can recommend this place 100%
